A demonstration match with wooden swords is arranged for the local lord, and an instructor from a nearby school is called to be his opponent. The instructor, not taking the boy seriously at first, learns quickly that he should not take the boy for granted. Both of them settle into a serious fight with their pride as warriors on the line. The match is hard fought, but finally the boy wins, and sets in motion a cascade of unforeseen consequences.  \n  \nWhile the boy is ferocious with the sword, he is ignorant of the intricacies of politics and court politeness that can even be deadlier that a blade. And when the instructor decides to kill himself out of shame, that is a consequence that shakes the boy out of his simplistic notions that sword matches are simply contests of skill, especially when the instructor requests that the boy be his second and cut his head off!  \n  \nAsagiro is a detailed period piece with compelling art, great sword-fights and it shows how important pride and position were in ancient Japan."},"links":{"al":"78031","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074CG76B7","bw":"series/124580/list","kt":"5511","mal":"48031","mu":"44262"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

7182a3a3-b292-4fdb-ab21-87bb9c4bcbd8:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7182a3a3-b292-4fdb-ab21-87bb9c4bcbd8","title":{"en":"Shotoku Taishi"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Prince Shotoku"},{"en":"Sacred Prince"},{"ja":"聖徳太子 (池田理代子)"},{"ja-ro":"Shotoku Taishi (Ikeda Riyoko)"}],"description":{"en":"(from ebookjapan):\nIn 574 A.D., a prince was born to Toyohi Tachibana and Princess Anahobe no Mato. This prince, called \"Umayado-Oji\" (Prince Umayado), who was intelligent from an early age and possessed magical powers, was the future Prince Shotoku, who became so famous in Japanese history for his establishment of the Twelve Crown Ranks and the Seventeen-Article Constitution. His short and tumultuous life was marked by deep compassion and sorrow for all living things.\n\n*Note: Comparisons have been made between this work and Ryoko Yamagishi's [Heaven's Son in the Land of the Rising Sun (Hi Izuru Tokoro no Tenshi)](https://mangadex.org/title/5998f257-e518-496f-92ed-d3a2391ff31e/heaven-s-son-in-the-land-of-the-rising-sun), to the point where there are claims that Ikeda plagiarized Yamagishi's work. In 2007, Ikeda remarked, \"A certain mangaka depicted a spiritual romance between Prince Shotoku and Soga no Emishi. I was uncomfortable by that...\" while also stating that her take on Shotoku was one faithful to history, since it was commissioned by Shittenoji. Though not named, the mangaka in question was most likely Yamagishi. Yamagishi herself did not comment on the matter.*\n\n*Readings/Articles on this subject:* [1](https://bokunolog.com/iedarieko/) [2](https://w.atwiki.jp/ikeda_cribbed/) [3](https://plus.chunichi.co.jp/blog/takashi_kaneiwa/article/620/9119/)"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B074CK9RPL?binding=kindle_edition\u0026searchxofy=true\u0026ref_=dbs_s_aps_series_rwt_tkin\u0026qid=1688991582\u0026sr=8-37","bw":"series/22524/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-1346615","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/104473/","mu":"ea4u7km"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Besser hätte es Athanasia kaum treffen können. Wäre nicht der Kaiser ein grausamer Tyrann, der sein Kind ablehnt und vernachlässigt. Noch als Baby wird Athanasia bewusst, dass in ihrem neuen Leben etwas ganz und gar nicht stimmt! Wenn sie nicht eine Überlebensstrategie entwickelt, wird sie an ihrem 18. Geburtstag auf Geheiß ihres eigenen Vaters sterben. So weit darf es nicht kommen. Also macht sich Athanasia daran ihr Schicksal zu verändern...\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51880368), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=3903318), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3240000001)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/whoprincess/1)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](http://kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/2991/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/princessnasi/list?title_no=1618)\n* [French / Français](http://delitoon.com/webtoon/dites-moi-princesse)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://altraverse.de/manga/athanasia-ploetzlich-prinzessin/)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/became-a-princess/list?title_no=1588)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/13034)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/became-a-princess/list?title_no=1625)","en":"When I opened my eyes, I had become a princess! But out of all the characters from this romance novel to be reborn into, why must it be the princess whose fate it is to die by the hands of her own blood-related father, the emperor?! If I want to live, I must never enter his sight. However…  \n\n\"Since when did this kind of scumbag start living in my castle?\"\n\nWithout a single tear to shed nor a drop of blood to spill, that cruel and cold emperor, Claude! Will I, the Princess Athanasia who was caught by him, survive?\n\n\"I… What should I do…\"\n\n---\nThe beautiful Athanasia was killed at the hands of her own biological father, Claude de Alger Obelia, the cold-blooded emperor! It’s just a silly bedtime story… until one woman wakes up to suddenly find she’s become that unfortunate princess! She needs a plan to survive her doomed fate, and time is running out. \n\nWill she go with Plan A, live as quietly as possible without being noticed by the infamous emperor? Plan B, collect enough money to escape the palace? Or will she be stuck with Plan C, sweet-talking her way into her father’s good graces?!\n\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51880368), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=3903318), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3240000001)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/whoprincess/1)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](http://kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/2991/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/princessnasi/list?title_no=1618)\n* [French / Français](http://delitoon.com/webtoon/dites-moi-princesse)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://altraverse.de/manga/athanasia-ploetzlich-prinzessin/)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/became-a-princess/list?title_no=1588)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/13034)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/became-a-princess/list?title_no=1625)","es":"¡Un día abrí mis ojos y me había convertido en una princesa! این فقط ی داستان شب بچگونس... تا اینکه دختره از خواب بیدار شد و فهمید به یه شاهزاده بدبخت تبدیل شده! اون برای زنده موندن از دست سرنوشتش به نقشه نیاز داشت، و یکمم زمان برای فرار. بنظرتون اون میتونه با نقشه A راحت زندگی کنه بدون اینکه مورد توجه امپراطور قرار بگیره؟ یا نقشه B، که میخواد پول کافی جمع کنه و بعدش بزنه به چاک؟ یاعم نقشه C؟ با شیرین زبونی و کاوایی بودن خودشو تو دل پدرش جا کنه؟!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51880368), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=3903318), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3240000001)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/whoprincess/1)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](http://kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/2991/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/princessnasi/list?title_no=1618)\n* [French / Français](http://delitoon.com/webtoon/dites-moi-princesse)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://altraverse.de/manga/athanasia-ploetzlich-prinzessin/)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/became-a-princess/list?title_no=1588)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/13034)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/became-a-princess/list?title_no=1625)","fr":"Areu Areu, je dois sauver ma vie! It includes illustrations of each character, minus monsters-of-the-day and other one-shot appearances for all five seasons of the series.  \n  \nThis collection is especially useful for Sailor Moon cosplayers who are looking to create the most accurate representation of a specific character’s outfit possible. 72b4e5cf-023c-445d-a24a-3180edb0977c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"72b4e5cf-023c-445d-a24a-3180edb0977c","title":{"en":"Kosodate Host wa Koi wo Tonaeru"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"子育てホストは恋を唱える"}],"lastChapter":"4","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"No. 1 host Chiharu is raising his dead sister's child. He's got no idea what he's doing, and everyday is a struggle. When one day, bad luck strikes him hard. he breaks his arm and because of a roof leak, his home is a mess. He's at a complete loss, when the Head Priest of the nearby temple comes to his aid, offering to let him live at the temple for the time being. However, he's astonished when he's introduced to the Head Priest's son. Standing in front of him was the only man who'd ever stolen the No.1 position from Chiharu - a former junior host: Fujinami! Even though he's younger, Fujinami is very composed and should be the kind of guy that Chiharu hates. But the big hands that touch Chiharu so gently, as if to spoil him, are so pleasant. In this world, slaves are not treated as humans. Since Niro’s adoptive parents are slaves, they are mistreated and eventually lose their lives. Now Niro is alone once more, and must shoulder the burdens of his family and do whatever is takes to protect his two younger siblings. If Niro wants to escape this fate, there is only one thing he can do. He must graduate from the academy, ‘Excanum’ just like the current Emperor, ‘Muren’ who was once a slave!\n\n---\n- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B6%85%E5%A5%B4%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84/86)\n\n- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647954)\n\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74286)\n\n- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Slave-B)\n\n- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/slave_B_%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AA/7)","fr":"Il n'est rien, il veut tout. Enfant esclave, il vivait heureux avant que ses deux parents ne se fassent assassiner par un maître jaloux ! Responsable de ses deux jeunes soeurs à seulement 13 ans, il essaie d’intégrer une prestigieuse école de magie qui les sauverait de leur condition. Cherchant à impressionner le roi pour y accéder, il échoue totalement et se retrouve finalement dans une mine infestée de monstres. Mais son courage et sa détermination le font remarquer. She then finds out that he likes someone….. but who? Alexander's sleep got disturbed by Miharu, who keeps getting into his coffin when he's drunk. What will become of the two of them tonight?  \n  \n*2.Help me, Alice!*  \nKazushi is sorting his things before going to university. Suddenly, he finds his favorite book \"Alice in Wonderland\" and falls asleep while reading it. Schuld an ihrer unfreiwilligen Reise ist das »Ritual zur Beschwörung der Heiligen Maid« am dortigen Königshof. Jene Maid soll die Kraft besitzen, die in diese Welt einfallenden Monster auszulöschen. Neben Sei ist mit Aira Misono noch eine zweite Frau erschienen, die vom Kronprinzen Kyle prompt zur Auserwählten bestimmt wird. Verstoßen und unfähig, nach Japan zurückzukehren, beginnt für Sei ein neues Leben in Slantania. Als Forscherin am Institut für Heilpflanzen findet sie schließlich eine neue Berufung. Da ihre magischen Tränke ungewöhnlich stark sind, kommt die Vermutung auf, dass sie doch die Heilige Maid sein könnte.\n\n---\n[Official English Scientist Ryohei Jagata is shot dead by an unknown assailant in his home. The assailant then steals a precious, and mysterious, stone hidden in Jagata's eye socket. He then makes his escape, but not before alerting Jagata's butler, Hanawa and Mimio. Mimio and Hanawa investigate what happened before running into the famous detective Shunsaku Ban, Mr. Mustachio.  \n\nMustachio overheard the gunshot as he was close by when it happened. Come sempre, il genere umano si divide tra gli avidi che cercano il profitto ad ogni costo e chi invece rimane fedele ai valori di giustizia e solidarietà: una lotta senza quartiere che inizia sulla Terra e terminerà nelle giungle preistoriche di Mamango. Ispirandosi a «Il mondo perduto» di Conan Doyle e a «L'isola del Dottor Moreau» di Wells, Osamu Tezuka edifica la prima delle sue grandi visioni fantascientifiche. Allora appena ventenne, l'autore mette in scena, già perfettamente caratterizzato, il suo celebre \"star system\" di figure ricorrenti, mentre mescola abilmente umorismo, avventura e dramma. 73836e5e-3eec-4ff0-b910-191bd9ade8fa:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"73836e5e-3eec-4ff0-b910-191bd9ade8fa","title":{"en":"Empress Wi Mokhwa"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"황후 위목화"}],"lastChapter":"201","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","fr"],"description":{"en":"Wi Mokhwa was given another chance at life. Her first life had been worse than hell, therefore, at her untimely death, life came flowing back into her.  \n  \nAt fifteen, she fell in love easily and believed Lee Gajun to be her destiny. There wouldn’t have been anything more perfect for eternity. However, facing death, Wi Mokhwa had to accept her cruel end. Her life at fifteen had been futile and was where her misery started.  \n  \nRegretting her life, she was given another chance. This time she has Lee Jejun's sincere feelings to protect her and stand by her side. He was willing to be her light even inside a dark world. This life was not doomed to fail.  \n  \nRevenge, salvation, and a miracle.  \nThis is her true life, the second life where it all begins again."},"links":{"al":"122919","ap":"empress-wi-mokhwa","engtl":"https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/394?languageCode=en","kt":"57329","mu":"164220","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54399711"},"originalLanguage":"ko","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Despite receiving such harsh criticism from everyone, she persisted in raising her 'children,' left behind from her late husband. On the day of her eldest son's wedding, signaling his possession of the family's seat as Marquess, she felt she had finally tied up all loose ends and could live the rest of her life out peacefully. However, she had been terribly mistaken as she finds herself getting caught up in an accident and dying whilst leaving the castle on his wedding day. Upon opening her eyes, she finds herself waking up to the day of her husband's funeral, seven years ago.\n\n'I refuse to suffer any more. I won’t live as I did in the past a second time!'","es":"La viuda de hierro, la viuda araña, la cazadora de hombres, la bruja del Castillo Neuschwanstein, la vergüenza de las damas de la nobleza… Estos eran los términos usados para describir a la Marquesa Shuli von Neuschwanstein. A pesar de recibir tan duras críticas de todos, ella persistió en criar a sus 'hijos', dejados a su cargo por su difunto esposo. En el día de la boda de su hijo mayor, en la que él tomó posesión del título familiar de Marqués, ella sintió que por fin había atado todos esos cabos sueltos y que por fin podría vivir su vida pacíficamente. Sin embargo, se equivocó de sobremanera, pues se halla víctima de un accidente mortal en el momento de su partida de dicha boda. Al abrir sus ojos, se halla despertando el día mismo del funeral de su esposo, siete años atrás.\n\n'Me rehuso a sufrir más. ¡No viviré como viví en el pasado por segunda vez!'\n\n---\nOfficial Translations:\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-fantasie-of-a-stepmother/info)\n* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6585/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/merveilleuse-maratre)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/A-Stepmothers-Marchen/3313)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/41993)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/เทพนิยายของแม่เลี้ยงชูริ/199)","fr":"Belle-mère à la rescousse! Mariée à l'âge de quatorze ans à un vieux noble rapidement décédé, elle se retrouve à devoir s'occuper de ses quatre beaux-enfants à peine plus jeunes qu'elle.
